name: The Living Cesspool

specials.name: Filth Wave
specials.description: The Living Cesspool unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures in a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 18 Reflex save or take 1d6 acid damage and take a â€“10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls prone). A creature can spend an Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action.

specials.name: Engulf
specials.description: The Living Cesspool moves up to its Speed and can move through the space of any creature of its size or smaller. The first time it enters each creature's space, the creature attempts a DC 18 Reflex save. On a success, the creature is pushed to the nearest space outside the ooze's path. On a failure, the creature is pulled into the ooze's space and becomes grabbed, taking 1d6 acid damage at the start of each of its turns while engulfed. Escaping the engulfment requires a successful DC 18 Athletics check.

specials.name: Sewage Surge
specials.description: The Living Cesspool causes the surrounding sewage to surge violently. All creatures within a 30-foot radius must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or be sickened 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure). Creatures that are already sickened increase their sickened condition by 1.

specials.name: Corrosive Form
specials.description: Any creature that strikes the sewer ooze with a melee unarmed attack or a non-reach melee weapon takes 1d4 acid damage.

description:
**Tactics** 
The Living Cesspool uses *Filth Wave* to hinder and damage multiple foes, then moves in to engulf isolated targets. It utilizes *Sewage Surge* to weaken groups of enemies, making them more susceptible to its attacks.

immunity.value: acid, bleed, critical hits, mental, precision, unconscious, visual
